text: The Memorial Aksakov Museum in Ufa is a writer's house biographical museum which commemorates the life and work of author Sergey Aksakov in an apartment where he lived in Ufa, Bashkortostan, Russia.http://museumrb.ru/filialy/memorialnyj-dom-muzej-s-t-aksakova/ Aksakov Museum It is located about two blocks from Republic House. ==See also== *Abramtsevo Colony ==References== Category:Ufa
title: Aksakov Museum
